entry.title: RT Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Smart contracts face a limitation in that they cannot directly access external data sources outside their blockchain envi...
entry.summary: RTâ€‚Jamiebones #30daysoftext Smart contracts face a limitation in that they cannot directly access external data sources outside their blockchain environment. This gap is addressed by oracles, which serve to connect smart contracts with external data sources.
